product_name: The North Face Venture Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Packable and versatile, The North Face Venture men's jacket lets you head out in just about any weather. It's engineered to withstand severe rain yet styled for everyday use. HyVent EC offers excellent waterproof, breathable performance; it's ideal for spring skiing and snowboarding, as well as urban and city hiking. Pit zippers allow cooling airflow as your activity heats up. Rip-and-stick stormflap prevents weather penetration through the full-length zipper; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Hem drawcord; elastic cuffs with rip-and-stick closure; adjustable hood; zippered hand pockets; jacket stows in left pocket. The Venture jacket's regular cut eases layering, and slightly long length adds protection. Closeout.
short_description: Packable and versatile, The North Face Venture men's jacket lets you head out in just about any weather. It's engineered to withstand severe rain yet styled for everyday use.
